NEXRAD Decoder

Updated: Apr 16, 2023, Created: Apr 16, 2023

Decoder for the WSR-88D's Radar Data Acquisition system's Level II weather data written in Rust. This decoder will allow me to decompress and decode radar data to be cached for fast access when generating volumetric renders.

GitHub Repository
